trends: There has been one other sighting in Edwardsville
There were no other sightings in Edwardsville on or around July 28th 2013
Summary: total of 4 objects, one passing around another, then reflective material falling
divs: Sighting Detailswe were sitting out back of my father in laws house. noticed a bright object that looked like a star. this object moved to the ne at what seemed to be a slow pace. appearing behind it two more objects of same appearance, both moving at similar speed. of these two, the object behind passed and half circled the first. then a fourth object of the same appearance appeared towards the first object, all moving to ne. Started to notice three to four different objects below the original that were flickering and falling to the ground, separate from original objects. had a passenger airline fly past around the time of the event heading e. objects headed ne to no longer visible. falling debris visible until blocked by trees and houses.
